snippet: The life coach and motivational speaker Tony Robbins spoke with Andrew Ross Sorkin of DealBook about his new book and the secret behind the brand known as Tony Robbins.
abstract: The life coach and motivational speaker Tony Robbins spoke with Andrew Ross Sorkin of DealBook about his new book and the secret behind the brand known as Tony Robbins.

headline.main: Video: Tony Robbins Reveals His Secret
